title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2104 - Evictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VII, subch. B, pt. 2104 - Evictions

State Regulations
§ 2104.1 - Restrictions on removal of tenant, including hotel tenants
§ 2104.2 - Proceedings for eviction without certificate
§ 2104.3 - Notices required in proceedings under section 2104.2
§ 2104.4 - Proceedings for eviction with certificate
§ 2104.5 - Occupancy by landlord or immediate family
§ 2104.6 - Tenant not using premises for own dwelling
§ 2104.7 - Subdivision by alteration or remodeling
§ 2104.8 - Demolition
§ 2104.9 - Withdrawal of occupied housing accommodations from rental market. [L. 1964, ch. 244]L. 1964, ch. 244

Notes

Statutory authority: L. 1950, ch. 250, as amd.; L. 1983, ch. 403, § 28; N.Y.C. Admin. Code, § 26-405g[1]; L. 1946, ch. 274[4][a], as amd.; Public Housing Law, §
14[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
